title: Werner Hartmann (wrestler)
text: Werner Hartmann (born 20 February 1942) is an Austrian <a href="amateur%20wrestling">wrestler</a>. He competed in the <a href="Wrestling%20at%20the%201960%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20Greco-Roman%20flyweight">men's Greco-Roman flyweight</a> at the <a href="1960%20Summer%20Olympics">1960 Summer Olympics</a>.
